column4: does anyone experience an issue with a video in Skype on 9.04?
did u install skype on 9.04?
yep
how? i can't seem to manage..
it was perfectly working in 8.04 "out of box"
it works in ekiga and cheese... but skype shows no video
ahh.. you upgraded ubuntu... with skype already in place?
I mean it shows strange colourful lines instead of a clear video, I think it's something to do with the video libraries
i tried to install skype for 8 but it broke...
could be they are working on it...?
I installed it from deb
it was working lovely in 8.04
from a downloaded package.deb?
yep... downloaded straight from skype.com
double-click and installed :)
for any reason video is broken now
mmm.. i tried that... did you use apt ore did u download and dubbleclick?
ok thnks il retry... bye
wich link did u use for the download? theres one for Ubuntu 7.04-8.04 and one for Debian Etch
http://www.skype.com/go/getskype-linux-ubuntu
for Ubuntu
thnks
np... let me know if the video is working for you :)
